fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: Abduct four players, they will be placed into their own channel for the public to see. This will be titled #killing-game

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
If there are no kill-capable roles inside of the four players, one will become kill-capable for the remainder of the killing game. Their kill will be "killed by [real role]. This cannot be changed.
If there is only one kill-capable role inside of the four players, they will automatically be chosen to kill, kill-capable is defined as any role with the ability to directly kill.
Your attributes may not be stolen, edited, or otherwise removed.
If there are multiple kill-capable roles inside of the four players, one player at random will be able to kill.
To win the killing game, the remaining three players must find the killer. If a non-killer is voted, then all players in the game besides the killer is dealt an overkill attack.
The killing game must end by the end of the next day, or the blackened will automatically win.
The Blackened has an attack level of Overkill, and removes the victims defense level entirely.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See your killing game successful. (the blackened wins).
